subject: Football
Concussions
Depression (Mental)
Athletics and Sports
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: Carl Ehrlich, the captain of the 2009 Harvard football team, contemplates the heartbreak of a lost rival and the consequences of brain trauma on the football field.
